items.sentence: Tom climbed into bed and turned off the light.
Tom is very sensitive to other people's moods.
Tom reluctantly did what Mary asked him to do.
Tom sat alone at the table, drinking absinthe.
Tom took a handkerchief out and blew his nose.
Tom unplugged the toaster and put it in a box.
Can I talk to you for just a second about Tom?
Tom's body had been stabbed over thirty times.
Tom overheard John and Mary talking about him.
I've already tried three different approaches.
